amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for ARPA-E by $127 million and to reduce funding for Weapons Activities by $98 million and Fossil Energy by $29 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funds in the Fossil Energy Research and Development account by $29,000,000 and increase funds in the Advanced Research Projects Agency - Energy account by $127,000,000 and the Weapons Activities account by $98,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Butterfield amendment (A023) Failed by recorded vote: 150 - 266 (Roll no. 326).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Butterfield amendment (A023) Failed by recorded vote: 150 - 266 (Roll no. 326).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A023) offered by Mr. Butterfield.
